messages.text:
Danyal ! Filhaal Sirf Organic leads & Optin Msg proper per Working/Focus kro & URBAN ke NEW campaign Ready/previous data khud search kro.

Sab Guide krdya  hy,Daily SEO Working sy Websites Social Media Pages per bhi optin kiu nahi aa raha hy,check krky urgent errors fix krwao & at least Daily 1 Company ke Website & Company/ PROJECTS ky different Social Media Pages ky Logos/Contact us BUTTONS & OFFICE PTCL,Mobile,Whatsapp,Email Logos per Client ky Click per automatic OPTIN/CONSENT ke Daily List send kro.

&

Amaan,Umaimma,Summaya & Shazaib sy remaining Working Final krwao/Report do & SEO,Web Designer,Graphic Designer Hiring Campaign sy applicants ke list sy Calls krky bulao & uptodate list send krdo.as per poicy pahly interview mei sab clear krny ky baad sirf selected applicants ko same day nahi different dates per for trial bulao.

&

Aapni Reports ky Mutabiq,Daily 1 Company ya Project ke Overseas/Pakistan Websites & Pakistan/Overseas ky Linked in,Twitter,Youtube & All Social Media Pages per Proper SEO TOOL APPLY & activity/Pages improve kro for DAILY OPT IN.
Daniyal bhai is agent ko bss is working ka short sa rely  krdy even in pdf/voice/image/ext

@Task Fahad
Fahad ! Time sy 5 Star jao.Sallaries & Pending payments release krni hai.Aapny NEW PORTAL per Calls & Sirf Payment ke baat kro.payments Krwao.Sab ko  Relocate ka inform kro & Daily payments krwao. without payment Aap ka Regular ZERO DAy  hy.

SEO,Web Designer,Graphic Designer Hiring Campaign sy applicants sy interviews per aany waly applicants ko trial bulao.

&

Mughy Admin Password ka Chooran nahi do.Azeem Kanjer sy Admin Password lo & Note krlo Chat Gpt ke File sy Whatsapp APi Ka Oracle software mei procedure sy System Hack & Wati waly Whatsapp Api sy Clients ko Payment ky msg send send krwadya tu Sab Previous dues as Penalty Deduct ho jaein gey.

Aaj Ashsarib sy Project Live & Amaan sy Project ke App ready krwalo.Sab Staff ky Mibile # add krky internal Office cimmunication project ke Final Testing krky mughy handover krdo.

&

Email ka wsit nahi kro,Aap khud kerlya mei issue kro & AI CALL CENTRE REVELIANCE AI CHAT GPT ke File study kro,10 other services ke details hai.not eleven labs.Current AI Call Centre mostly ready made & limited 50-100 Calls per day ka IP Telephonic communication setup hy,cosider it like PTCL ON IP.

ORIGNAL AI CALL CENTRE REVILIANCE AI PER BASED & FOR UPTO 1,000 USERS PER DAY HY.SATURDAY SY AI REBELIANCE CALL CENTRE PER Khud WORKING START KRO.

&

TOTAL 14 WEBSITES & Social Media ky Local/Overseas  Page ke Danyal sy Lists lylo.Amaan ky Msg/Proposal ky Mutabiq Optin Set krwao & Daikho.Danyal ke Daily SEO Working sy Websites Social Media Pages per bhi koi optin nahi aa raha hy,check krky urgent errors fix kro & at least Daily 1 Company ke Website & Company/ PROJECTS ky different Social Media Pages ky Logos/Contact us BUTTONS & OFFICE PTCL,Mobile,Whatsapp,Email Logos per Client ky Click per automatic OPTIN/CONSENT ke Daily List send kro.

Shazaib and Umama has wrongly implemented opt-in functionality in all sites & Danyal ke Report ky mutabiq Daily websites & Soicial Media pages per Visitors/Followers aa rahy hai.2 Month mei 20 Campaigns bhi Run ke hai,Aab Website ky Landing pages sy campaigns Run ho rahe hai & Daily Social Media pages per activity sy traffic bhi hy.
